More info See in Glossary to view its properties. Property Description Mode Global URP sizes this Adaptive Probe Volume to include all renderers in the scene or Baking Set that have Contribute Global Illumination enabled in their Mesh Renderer component . URP recalculates the

volume size every time you save or generate lighting. Scene URP sizes this Adaptive Probe Volume to include all renderers in the same scene as this Adaptive Probe Volume. URP recalculates the volume size every time you save or generate lighting. Local Set the size of this Adaptive Probe Volume manually. Size Set the size of this Adaptive Probe Volume. This setting only appears when you set Mode to Local . Subdivision Override Override Probe Spacing Override the Probe Spacing set in the Baking Set for this Adaptive Probe Volume. This cannot exceed the Min Probe Spacing and Max Probe Spacing values in the Adaptive Probe Volumes panel in the Lighting window . Geometry Settings Override Renderer Filters Enable filtering by Layer which GameObjects URP considers when it generates probe positions. Use this to exclude certain GameObjects from contributing to Adaptive Probe Volume lighting. Layer Mask Filter by Layer which GameObjects URP considers when it generates probe positions. Min Renderer

Size The smallest Renderer size URP considers when it generates probe positions. Fill Empty Spaces Enable URP filling the empty space between and around Renderers with bricks. Bricks in empty spaces always use the Max Probe Spacing value.
